website_summaries.verdict: Compatible with most digital cameras, this kit earns high marks for variety of materials and all-natural cleaning solution.
pros: Includes multiple microfiber cloths for dust-free lens cleaning and swabs for sensors
A lens brush for stubborn particles and air blower for hard-to-reach crevices complete this camera-cleaning system
Cleaning solution is chemical-free and won't leave streaks or smudges
Carrying case keeps kit organized inside a camera bag
cons: Solution takes a long time to dry on sensors, and might smudge if not completely dry

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned my sensor real shiny
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to clean the sensor on my Nikon d7100. I'd blow it off from time to time but that never quite got everything clear and eventually I ended up with 3 or 4 big stubborn spots that wouldn't go away. I was a little hesitant after reading some warnings about cleaning your own sensor but was so frustrated with those spots I decided to give it a shot. I followed the YouTube directions exactly and ended up using all 6 swabs (3 cleanings). You really only need a misting on the wet swab and there were no streaks that i could see. My sensor is completely clean now so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: dexter holliday

customer_reviews.title: High quality and filled with goodies!
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit! It had even more than I thought. They include Magic Fiber cloths, which are recognized as one of the best micro fiber cloths you can buy...and they included a regular sized one and extra large one to boot! Not only that, but rice paper lens cleaning wipes are included as well for when wet cleaning is needed. I could not be happier with the contents. The zipper case is very convenient and surprisingly high quality. This kit is well done, and well worth the money. I have a Sony a6000.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Schultz

customer_reviews.title: I liked that there were instructions included in an online video ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product as a cheap alternative to some of the more expensive kits and was impressed. I liked that there were instructions included in an online video if you had never cleaned your sensor before like I hadn't. I liked that it did not leave streaks and that it could be used on the sensor and on the lenses. I also liked that all the products came in case to keep all your cleaning supplies in one place in your camera bag. I would purchase this again as opposed to purchasing these items individually.
customer_reviews.author: Kaytlyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Followed the Youtube instructions and worked perfectly. Even though I shoot professionally I was always nervous about cleaning the sensor, but it was simple and fast. I had a spot on the last bunch of photoshoots which I had to edit out in software. Didn't want to send my pro camera out to get it cleaned so I took a chance to do it myself. Many people online said it was easy and it was. Took maybe 5 minutes even going slow and it was perfectly clean. Took some test shots to be sure, all good. That 5 minutes and reasonable cost will save me hours in editing those spots off my images. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great value, excellent performance.
customer_reviews.text: I had some really nasty spots on my Canon M50 sensor. I was unsure how they got there, but believe me when I say that they were not tiny little specks. It looks like something had dropped on the sensor and dried this really weird white color. Regardless of what it was, i was sure my sensor was ruined. I was devastated. Before throwing in the towel i decided to give this kit a try and i gotta say, best $20 I ever spent. Follow the directions, be super careful, and ensure you’re in a very clean environment. The spots were taken off my sensor without issue. If you need a cleaning kit for your dslr/mirrorless, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: infestissumam

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase for the Value
customer_reviews.text: LOTS in here for the money. Swabs cleaned the crud off my sensor beautifully. More than enough lens papers to last me a long time. Rocket blower works well, cleaner works well & leaves no streaks. Case is even well constructed and seems durable enough. This kit has everything you need & all the components seem good quality. Only downside is coming with 6 sensor swabs. You could go through those quickly as you may need several for one cleaning (if your sensor was disgusting like mine). So be prepared to stock up on those.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Hemsath

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works OK
customer_reviews.text: I got this kit today. After viewing their YouTube videos, it seems not that hard. I bought my Nikon D7100 two years ago, and one week later I noticed some oil spots in the sensor. I was hesitate to clean the sensor myself because of being afraid of damaging the sensor. Then more oil spots show up in the photos as time goes by. I can no longer tolerate the situation, and decided to do the cleaning myself. Following the video instructions and it took only a few minutes to get the job done. All oil spots are gone now and it was really easy. Surprising me that nearly two year's oil spots buildups are gone with 2 swipes!
customer_reviews.author: SF Beach

customer_reviews.title: This comes WITH lens/sensor safe solution...Check comparables!
customer_reviews.text: Going back and forth between this and a few other kits in the same price range, I read the fine print and the others only came with an empty bottle "to put your favorite solution in" or a LENS ONLY cleaner. So I spent a few bucks more to get this and I am glad I did! -Case was a lot nicer than expected. Soft but sturdy shell, quality with a nice interior. -I only used the rocket blower, solution, wipe and cloth...All were of nice quality! -Solution cleaned my sensor with no issues! -Really nice portable brush/lens cleaner included. -Trusted name.
customer_reviews.author: F. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Success Removing Spots
customer_reviews.text: Using this kit was my first attempt at cleaning my D7000 sensor other than electronically or with canned air. I was frustrated with two stubborn spots on my photos. So I decided to try the contact method with this kit. I was careful to keep everything as “sterile “ (mainly dust and lint) as possible and just did it. And I could not be happier with the results. Spots gone. So with a little care and thought, I think anyone can do this.
customer_reviews.author: D. Porter

customer_reviews.title: It is OK if you get the correct Item.
customer_reviews.text: Comes with very little of the expensive swabs to clean the camera sensor, did not fully clean and left me frustrated because despite matching the size of the swab to the sensor of my camera, the swabs are still too small and are unable to clean my sensor fully, leaving dust. I am not sure if this was a manufacturing defect or just a mislabeled product but I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M

customer_reviews.title: Save me a lot of money and time.
customer_reviews.text: I switch my lenses a lot every time I go out to taking photos, so that why my camera sensor dirty all the time. At first I am scare to clean the sensor, but after what manufacture YouTube video I did it myself. It is really easy. The kit included everything you need so if you just buy your first camera so this kit is the must, and you don't need to spend extra money to buy them separately.
customer_reviews.author: Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Product works as advertised and my sensor is clean and free of any spots. I was reluctant at first to clean my sensor myself but the process was easy and with just a quick review on you tube from Digital Goja I was ready to do it myself. Sensor was clean from the many spots it had and that were visible on my images. New ones have no spots and I'm happy with this investment. Kit comes with everything you need and then some so the only thing you might need to add is more cleaning swabs. The spray cleaner should last a life time if only used for the sensor.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Joe

customer_reviews.title: Garbage product from a garbage company, I want more than a refund from this product
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worst products I’ve found on amazon the swabs started streaking the sensor up and basically made the camera useless for the time being very disappointed, and like I said in the title I want more than a refund for this garbage
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Company is as great as their products.
customer_reviews.text: This guys are amazing I bought by mistake the crop sensor set (Guys pls look before you buy what sensor you have) and asked them if I can still used for a full frame as I already opened. Their reply? There is a a new one on the way to me. I didn't expect that from them. Their customer service is AMAZING And from the opened one I saw their products are amazing as well and durable. Can't wait to get the full frame set.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Altura
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several products from Altura now, and all have been exeptional. Great prices, but you get way more than you would expect. The quality of all of the items ive used has been increditble. Have been very happy with everything. Well made, the case is an awesome thing to keep all your cleaning things together and clean. had enough room to add some other items that I had already had. the microfiber clothes are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Cleans perfectly, no smears and nice extras in the kit.
customer_reviews.text: The cleaning swabs and spray worked perfectly. You can see the before and after pictures includes with my review. Instructions were clear and easy to follow. I was very concerned about scratching the sensor and ruining my camera, but that did not happen at all. Really appreciated the large size of the air bulb. Gets rid of the dust. Also liked the extra brushes and microfiber cloths that came in the kit. Nice package overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, kinda expensive
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this seems more like a $20 kit than the nearly 30 I paid for it. The case and materials seem well made. I have used them on two serious shoot locations. I am not using the included cleaning solution because i already use my own recipe. I would buy again, it is a good balance of materials to keep the world off your lenses and sensors.
customer_reviews.author: Brig Young

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as other view.
customer_reviews.text: I had one tiny dirty spot on sensor that might have been caused by water. I bought this kit after watching a few video demos. I had to use used 4 swabs with cleaning solution to remove the spot and it seems there is still a trace of smear left behind along the sweeping path. The lent free lens clean cloth left more dust on the lens and I had to blow it off with the blower. Overall, this is not as good as expected, if I received a legit kit.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value For The $$'s!
customer_reviews.text: For the price point it's a tremendous value. Don't waste your money on the kits priced a couple of bucks cheaper than this one just to save a few dollars. They are next to worthless. I know, I've tried several for my wife. I was very pleasantly surprised after opening the box for this kit!!
customer_reviews.author: Dereklsj

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This kit had everything I needed. I noticed it was harder to get a sharp focus on my camera and then I noticed a small spot in my pictures when zooming all the way in. I used an air blower and it didn’t work so I bought this kit to clean the sensor. I watched some videos with instructions how to use it properly, cleaned the sensor twice, and problem solved! It wasn’t as hard as I thought it would be. I like that it came in a carrying case so it’s convenient to take it on trips too. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: kani

customer_reviews.title: JUNK! BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: The air rocket broke LITERALLY on the first squeeze! The plug in the back of it popped off! The "cleaning solution" is water... And the rest of the kit is cheap junk! This kit IS NOT worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: R. Higdon

customer_reviews.title: Compact Camera Cleaning Set
customer_reviews.text: Excellent combination of cleaning materials for a camera. I had some dust on my Sony Alpha 6000 and this kit was just what I needed to clean the imaging surface as well as several of my lens. Highly recommended. I would also recommend the video on YouTube which shows how to best use the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice small kit that works great and is easy to carry when traveling!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good kit to maintain my sony A6300 mirrorless camera so gave this one a shot. I have been very happy with it. It all came in a nice carry case and includes quality components. I would recommend this for anyone who wants to take care of their digital cameras and especially mirrorless cameras which are much more prone to dust contaminants than traditional DSLR cameras for some reason. It makes a great cleaning kit to throw in the camera bag when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: shelly k.

customer_reviews.title: Professional kit has everything needed to clean lenses and sensor at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for to clean my lens and sensor on my camera. Just paid 60.00 to have a camera shop clean my sensor. It took 4 days and the sensor is still not clean. This kit was more than 50% off and came with more than I expected. There is a large micro fiber cloth that I am using now for my computer and TV screens. Nice sturdy case. Does the job and gives confidence to even amateur DSLR photographers to maintain their cameras without using camera shops.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne MarcouxTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t the first Altura product I’ve purchased, and it won’t be the last. This cleaning kit is well thought out, includes quality items and comes in a nice case. The case is too large to fit in my Clik Elite or LowePro 350 AW packs with all the lenses and other equipment. I take out the things I need in the field & keep the case home with the sensor cleaning stuff. Also, check out the Digital Goja videos on YouTube - VERY helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Cole R.

customer_reviews.title: A Very Complete Cleaning Kit
customer_reviews.text: The Altura Cleaning Kit is a great purchase as a comprehensive collection of what you will need to clean the APS-C sensor of your DSLR. The kit is bundled with a easy to carry case that will fit in your camera bag. It contains all the items you will need to keep your camera and lenses clean and functioning well. Support videos available online are helpful and easy to understand that demonstrate how the kit components are used.
customer_reviews.author: BRUCE A LEE

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I am a very huge fan of Altura Photo products and their very helpful videos on Youtube! I purchased this cleaning kit (I had a cheaper cleaning kit just for my lenses) when I discovered I had a dirty sensor. Once I got it, I went right to their Youtube page and watched a helpful video on how to clean my sensor, and ta-dah! My T6 shoots like a brand new camera again. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen DiGiorgio

customer_reviews.title: Good kit.
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product. I clean my lenses frequently and sensors at least quarterly. The kit comes with everything shown. The new solution is good but I question its use on my sensors. When I first cleaned the sensors, it didn't dry well enough and left visible dots on the sensor. I strongly recommend true sensor cleaning solutions which dry fast and evaporate. I am not a fan of the micro fiber cleaning wands included.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M. Grivetti

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I was needing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera cleaning kit. My sensor was dirty and I really only needed the cleaning fluid and swabs, but the other items were nice to have as well, especially the Air Blower. To buy these items separately came close to the price for this kit, so I went ahead and got it. Now my sensor is clean and ready to do some photography.
customer_reviews.author: M.Chaney

customer_reviews.title: Poor value, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I immediately returned this item. For $30, it is simply way overpriced. You get a microfiber cloth, some cleaning implements and some cleaning liquid. If this were $10 I would be singing its praises, but at $30 it is simply not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Gear Head

customer_reviews.title: Decent cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter said she’d rate the kit 4 out of 5 stars. She is able to carry with her as it is light weight and compact. She has used several times. Finally something she cleans without rolling her eyes. Haha It was a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Gibson

customer_reviews.title: A very complete sensor and lens cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: With the Altura Cleaning Kit, I was able to do a thorough job cleaning the image sensor on my Sony a6300 camera. In a few minutes, all the dust particles were gone! I haven't even tried the cleaning swabs and the liquid yet. Just one of the brushes and the rubber bulb took care of the problem. The carrying case is nice, too. This is a very comprehensive kit for the money. I am very happy with it. I will point out that there are no instructions in the kit. You are expected to go to the Digital Goya website, or you can watch YouTube videos, to learn how to use the kit. This works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Flyer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm on Sony A6000
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit because I had a really dirty sensor on my Sony A6000 from a travel-full summer. My lens also needed some TLC. I used the blower tool and just one of the sensor wipe sticks and now there are no spots left at even the highest aperture shots! This was way cheaper than getting a shop to clean it for me. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Aly B

customer_reviews.title: Every photo bag should have this.
customer_reviews.text: I noticed I had dust in my camera and figured the sensor needed to be cleaned. I wanted to learn to do it myself so I watched some videos and bought this kit. Seriously 10 seconds is about what it took to clean the sensor and the spots on my photos are gone. Great value/great kit. Also the seller -Digital Goja- has the best customer service you will ever experience anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: B. Overstreet

customer_reviews.title: works great. very easy to do and saved me lots ...
customer_reviews.text: works great. very easy to do and saved me lots of money from having the camera shop clean my camera. I was getting dust spots and dark circles on my pictures, which made me very upset when a great shot is not prefect anymore. I do a lot of photography and sell on a website so I cannot accept any less than perfection photos. The kit is nicely packaged and a real value for the money. Dan from KDCLearwatercorp.com
customer_reviews.author: financeguy

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice kit. Also
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as advertised. The case is well built, and solid enough to protect the contents, yet not so hard as to be unruly. I only used the air puffer and the swabs, but they cleaned the sensor very well. I have a pinhole lens for my xpro2, so any particles whatsoever would show up on the image. The swabs cleaned the sensor very well, and I could not see any particles afterward. It's a nice kit. Also, there is a video online for how to use the swabs. Helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Jaffe

customer_reviews.title: Great for camera. Excellent hard shell carrying case
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to use out of the box and I cleaned my Sony A6000 mirrorless sensor with it easily. I did not have any lense or sensor cleaning equipment so getting it all in one package was good. Small air blower to remove dust or debris from the lens. Very soft touch brushes are included too. One medium micro fiber cloth as well as one rather large one. Cleaning solution and specialized wipers for sensors, as well as lint free tissue paper. 11/10 would recommend to anyone with a camera.
customer_reviews.author: Quincy

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: The product it's great, it would be nice and very practical for us (I used all the swabs on one cleaning session, I need more practice) if you could sell a pack swabs, for example a 12 pack. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel O.

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning sensors and camera bodies
customer_reviews.text: I watched a Youtube video of how to use the various items in this kit. It was extremely helpful. But, best of all, the sensor cleaning wipe on a stick works perfectly. No streaks or debris left behind. Really a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: This works great. The only thing is that the swab size was slightly smaller than the sensor. I had to use 2 to clean the sensor. It was listed as the correct size for my camera. Other brands may be the same, I don't know. I was kind of disappointed as I thought I would be able to clean it 6 times as I received 6 swabs. Other than that, I am very happy. I have never cleaned my sensor but I had dust that was showing up in photos, so it needed to be done. By watching the YouTube videos, provided in the description, I felt confident that I could do this.
customer_reviews.author: April K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Kit, Especially for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The selection of cleaning accessories is very thorough, and it does an amazing job cleaning optics. Even though I bought it for my camera, I have ended up using it to clean my glasses, my phone screen, and a number of other glass, optical surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hall

customer_reviews.title: I Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little kit! The MagicFiber cloth is great and the spray cleaner worked beautifully. The storage case is perfectly sized and durable. I am very pleased with this purchase and recommend to anyone looking to keep their camera equipment clean - video or still.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Mur

customer_reviews.title: Will Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: More of the Altura brand accessories i buy the more i'm liking this company. Cleaned my camera sensor with ease, and now i'm saving soo many hours of editing out a few dots from every picture. Simple to Use Did the job well and safely more my camera and nice accessories to come with for cleaning
customer_reviews.author: MrPenguin

customer_reviews.title: must have!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. I touched my sensor while on vacation, then tried to wipe with a cloth which smeared things. Then I started freaking out because I know things aren't supposed to mess with the sensor. Did some research and the self cleaning method wasn't effective and came across these. They are a must have. Made my sensor good and as clean as new. Also was able to get some spots off my lens that were showing up in pictures too. Just watch the video instruction on how to use them properly.
customer_reviews.author: KrisR33

customer_reviews.title: Large but efficient.
customer_reviews.text: The black case the items come in is fairly large, not one that can easily fit into a camera bag without taking up quite a bit of space. However, it does serve it's purpose as a means of storing all your cleaning supplies which is awesome. All the products are good quality, multiple sensor cleaners and multiple microfiber cleaning cloths which is nice! If your looking for a consolidated grab and go to pack with your camera this might not be the right one, but if you just need cleaning supplies to prep your camera before a day out-this is great. Stores everything together and fits multiple items in one. Can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Lin H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it and noob friendly.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Sony a6000. There was a finger print smack dab in the middle of my sensor. Purchased this kit based on reviews and price. It worked flawlessly. I was scared to even touch the sensor, let alone clean it. It's a lot simpler than you think it is. Follow the directions, take it slow and you will have a sensor just as clean as the day you purchased the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner is gentle and streak free.
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit....I would order by extra wipes/applicators. Try air first, then use the wipes as directed, changing sides each swipe, then discard. Never drag a wipe/applicator across your sensor that may have dust or dirt already on it....use a new one or a new side.
customer_reviews.author: Quincyp

customer_reviews.title: Why didnt I buy these years ago?
customer_reviews.text: This item is a valuable addition to my gear. My lens and censor have never been clearer. Great product I would recommend anyone into photography include in their bag.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Crop/full frame sized swabs. Follow directions carefully for optimum results.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for keeping my camera in top condition. It cleaned an extremely dirty DSLR sensor without any issues and saved countless hours removing dust spots in post processing. Image clarity is excellent after using this product. Above-average customer service. The only thing I would request is that the company include more swabs in the kit, or sell additional swabs separately.
customer_reviews.author: ravenhorse

customer_reviews.title: Comes with all you need plus junk and a over sized case
customer_reviews.text: The only things you need out of this kit the the swabs and the sensor cleaner. If you don't already have a blower then thats an added bonus. It comes with a lot of junk. The caring case it way larger than expected, its meant to carry all the things above so its not small and travel sized. The apsc swabs also seem to be thinner than the width of my D7000 APSC sensor, like it needed to be 1 or 2 mm wider to cover the whole sensor in one swipe. I'm not sure if this is consistent with other swabs but I will be trying another brand of swabs.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I had some dust on my DSLR camera's sensor. I tried everything to get rid of it. The brush in this kit helped, but the swabs really did the job. No more dust.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Altura Photo Professional Cleaning Kit for DSLR review
customer_reviews.text: I having been looking to purchase a blower for awhile but I saw this bundle deal and great reviews that I had to buy it. I was nervous I would ruin my sensor but the Youtube video from Altura shows you what you need to do. I cleaned my lens and had never damaged my sensor. I dont know why I took so long to buy it. I swap lenses all the time so I am always going to get dirt on my sensor. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for used cameras
customer_reviews.text: Bought a high end camera, used, for a very low price. The sensor was terribly dirty and I was debating returning it. One use with this kit and now my sensor is 100% dust free and I’m really enjoying my new camera. Great piece of kit.
customer_reviews.author: D. Muya

customer_reviews.title: Good seller response, good product
customer_reviews.text: EDITED Originally did not come with sensor cleaning swabs, which was what I bought the kit for. Digital Goja reached out to me and sent replacement swabs quickly and free of charge. The swabs are fantastic. I foolishly breathed on my sensor and it desperately needed a serious clean. The first swab didn't do much; by the third the sensor was like new. They worked perfectly. Before using, I held the swabs about a 8-10 inches away from the included spray bottle and dusted each side with cleaning solution, just one spritz.
customer_reviews.author: Alec M.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful kit
customer_reviews.text: Very useful cleaning set. The sensor cleaning liquid works very well and doesn't leave a residue, I'm impressed. The case is tall enough for the blower to fit perfectly. Happy with purchase, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ivonneak

customer_reviews.title: Has what you need.
customer_reviews.text: I do astrophotography (learning to anyway) and some amateur photography. Has enough variation of tools in the kit to make it useable for both.
customer_reviews.author: Gary T.

customer_reviews.title: Worked well and solved my problem
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with spots on my digital photo's so had to do something. It's a bit nerve wracking to be messing with the sensor, but this kit had everything I needed and worked like a champ to solve my problem. Hope I never have to use it again, but if I do ... thanks to this kit, I'm ready
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I used to pay upwards of $100 a pop to have the local camera store clean my sensors. Then I learned to do it on my own (it's REALLY not difficult). This sensor cleaning kit is great, comes with everything you need to keep your sensors and lenses clean and comes all nicely packaged in its own carrying case. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TheStumpys

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job and Does it Well
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised to clean my Canon crop sensor. Went from extremely dirty to clean just by following the You Tube instructions. I'll buy more swabs when I run out. I also love the large microfiber cloth for cleaning my touchscreen and monitor screens.
customer_reviews.author: rcfalcon

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this kit. The Lens Pen leaves debris all over the lens! Cannot use that part at all! The Sensor Swabs felt like they may actually scratch the sensor. Not sure if my kit was a dud or not? The blower works great tho!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice kit. Made an abused, 13-year-old Nikon dSLR like new for short money. Case makes it easy to toss in a bag with Th rest of your gear. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Citydog

customer_reviews.title: Sensor, Clean as a whistle!
customer_reviews.text: Nice complete package for cleaning and maintaining your DSLR sensor. Thought I really messed up my sensor with what I hoped was a clean micro cloth. Worse than ever! Invested in this package and quickly and easily removed the offending dust particles. Great instructions and video links gave me the confidence to do it right!
customer_reviews.author: Gary T. Allan

customer_reviews.title: Great all around cleaning kit!
customer_reviews.text: Used on my Sony A6000 sensor without any issues (must use clean swatches each pass!). I loved the included microfiber cloths and use them along with the spray to clean my glasses every day. I'm able to use the blower on my camera lenses with ease on the go. Love the hard carrying case for storage and travel. Would definitely purchase Altura products again.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Just buy this one
customer_reviews.text: After trying to compare all of these kits, I finally bit the bullet and bought this one. It's rated 5 stars for a reason. It cleaned my camera and I'm happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: heyitsjules

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement lense kit
customer_reviews.text: Back in the day I always had a lens kit with me. I have gone back to some photography but my old lens kit is somewhere lost in space. This is a great replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: What a great kit
customer_reviews.text: Bought a lumix camera body used. The used camera cost me 400 less than a new body but there were some spots on the sensor. Couldn't tell by the images but i knew they were there. Cleaned completely off with this kit. Cleaned all of my lenses too like new. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: LongtimeAmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Grade A! Altura hasn't let me down in price or performance!
customer_reviews.text: In a word priceless! Everything you need to properly keep and maintain the upkeep of your camera. This kit looks expensive but actually isnt in dollars but will change your entire perspective of what your camera and lenses is supposed to look like most times. Altura Professional Cleaning Kit is all I need to keep my equipment at its best in appearance and performance. Thanks Altura!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander S.

customer_reviews.title: Great package for cleaning cameras
customer_reviews.text: The kit was perfect for what I needed. It comes with every tool that you need to clean your lens plus a link to YouTube videos on how to use it. Very useful. My only dissatisfaction is that the limited number of sensor swabs it comes with. Each time you clean it, you need to use two of them. Consider locating a vendor who sells affordable sensor cleaning swabs.
customer_reviews.author: Firestorm

customer_reviews.title: The brush alone was worth it to me, the rest looks well made.
customer_reviews.text: Good product, nice kit, carrying case looks like it might hold up for years? That would be strange. The brush is extremely soft and I did not worry about using it, and it really helps. I haven’t felt it bad enough for swabs yet, for the price, a few more swabs would be very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit!
customer_reviews.text: My camera was a bit banged up after a recent beach trip and this kit completely rescued it! Got out all the sand and perfectly cleaned the lens. Also gave the sensor a quick swab and can definitely see the difference in the pic quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works as intended
customer_reviews.text: No big difference between other products is it to use came with what it said. I would recommend the price is accessible but there is no special thing about it just like it wouldn't be with any other product like this.
customer_reviews.author: Octavio Perez Wences

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaning kit.
customer_reviews.text: It's good cleaner kit but when I just brushed the brush on my filter it kind of left some miniscule streaks or something. I don't think it affected the quality of the photo but it just bothered me because I could see when I tool the lens out and saw the green hue that comes in the filter and then you can see the brush marks. But that's just me being picky.
customer_reviews.author: Mitz P

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning sensors with a little guts
customer_reviews.text: OK, I had a dirty sensor and tried this before taking it into a camera shop have the sensor cleaned. Tools provided allowed me to do it myself with great results the first time. When you understand what you’re trying to do, and with a little patience, it really wasn’t that hard.
customer_reviews.author: CheapSeats

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit saved my A**... lol bought a new camera (Sony a6000) and first week I planted my thumb on the sensor... No one in my city cleaned sensor and Best Buy wanted to send it off and charge me $200.00 so I got on YouTube and seen the video..... Bought this kit and it worked perfectly.... Thank You Altura Photo
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Miller

customer_reviews.title: like me, who has never cleaned the camera before
customer_reviews.text: I've been meaning to clean my camera for a while now and found this reasonably priced kit. What I am most thankful for is that there are helpful videos available from the company that gives advice and tutorials for someone, like me, who has never cleaned the camera before. Additionally, the spray they use is natural and doesn't have any harsh chemicals which is important since it also doubles as glass lens cleaner, too. If you're looking for something reasonable this is a wise purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle B.

customer_reviews.title: If you have a DSLR you should have this kit
customer_reviews.text: very nice kit was helping a friend clean her sensor the other day in her D5200 and this kit worked a treat. used the solution on the aps-c cleaning tip and got off the smudges and it left it streak free an ready to go. the air blower is nice and high quality, brushes included in the kit are well made with no loose fibers. over all a great complete cleaning kit
customer_reviews.author: robert wakut

customer_reviews.title: Several products to tackle cleaning challenges.
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a lot of stuff to help clean a camera. Products seem like high quality. Not sure how effective each piece will be but it is definitely a product I am glad I bought.
customer_reviews.author: F4Manic

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy with this kit and one of the best parts ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this kit and one of the best parts was the hard case holding the kit. The solution worked very good on sensor left no residue. Overall great product. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Gardner

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little kit that is well organized and comes in a nice case to keep everything together. Worked well, would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DGalvao

customer_reviews.title: Two swabs and my sensor was like new. Awesome product and Altura Photo has proven ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a little nervous about cleaning my sensor on my mirror-less camera. The cleaning kit provided a instructions as well as a YouTube channel that gave in depth instruction on how to use the product properly. Two swabs and my sensor was like new. Awesome product and Altura Photo has proven to be a quality company. Look forward to purchasing this product again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: I cleaned them both and am very happy now that I cannot see those spots any longer
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 professional cameras (D200, D300s, and D700). The D200 and D300 had spots on the sensor that I could see in photographs I took with a lot of blue sky. I cleaned them both and am very happy now that I cannot see those spots any longer. The D300s was the worst and took two cleanings to get all of the dust/spots off. I have enough swabs for 3 more cleanings.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M. Skelly

customer_reviews.title: Just about anything one would need to clean their camera gear, inside and out.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and I have used only once so far, but was well pleased, because it did a great job on my camera sensor. I had a troublesome spot that I just could not get off of it. The product was well packaged and well equipped with everything that anyone would want to use in camera maintenance. The product also arrived in a very timely fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Potter

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I was scared to try to clean my Nikon's interior, but with no stores nearby that do it, after watching a YouTube video on how to do it and getting this set, it ended up being fantastically easy. This set worked like a charm on a very dirty sensor!!! I'll be buying this again. Well worth every cent. Lovely case that will travel easy. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: klpiel

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased and satisfied with results
customer_reviews.text: I was getting spots all over my pictures. After using this product all the spots have gone away. Extremely happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Kuhl

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This cleaning kit was exactly what I was looking for. It has everything you need, all in a hard case. We even received a note from the company owner with his email in case there were any issues.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Complete Camera Cleaning Kit
customer_reviews.text: As described and arrived quickly. Good quality, but haven't yet had a chance to try the sensor cleaner, which is probably the most critical part of the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike T

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Products and Case
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case and products - just can't beat for the price point. Especially purchasing on Prime Day which even made it a better bargin! The case is soft, but firm with a substantial zipper - nice surprise!
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Quality great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to maintain your DSLR on the road. Quality great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AspieMan

customer_reviews.title: Best DSLR APS-C Cleaning Kit!
customer_reviews.text: By far, one of the best professional DSLR cleaning kits on the market. I have used everything in the kit, but more importantly, they all work as described. For me, the highlights in this kit is the bottle of all-natural lens and sensor cleaning solution, the MagicFiber microfiber clean cloths, and the Altura APS-C sensor cleaning swabs. Amazing package at a decently affordable price point.
customer_reviews.author: Allen L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit for cleaning the mirror on my dslr which is tricky without the right tools
customer_reviews.author: Samantha S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick & thorough cleanings!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great in cleaning APS-C sensors on Leica T Typ 701, Nikon D500 and Blackmagic Design URSA Mini 4.6k. Zero dust on all sensors after treatment. The handle on the small brush is a little flimsy (-1 star) but the rest of the accessories are quality enough. Also the cleaning solution really is streak free. If you follow their simple instructions on YouTube everything works great. : )
customer_reviews.author: Michael ORourke

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: left my lens dirtier than it was before. Lint from the "microfiber" cloth everywhere. Streaks everywhere. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Altura Photo Professional Cleaning Kit APS-C DSLR Cameras Sensor Cleaning Swabs with Carry Case
customer_reviews.text: I found this kit to be very useful and nice looking, made well and holds all my cleaning supplies and yes I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: John O'Hanlon

customer_reviews.title: Simply Gets The Job done!
customer_reviews.text: The item is as described, it clean my mirroless camera’s Apsc sensor with no hassle, I’m a first time user and owner of an apsc mirrorless camera. It can also be used to clean your various lenses. The cleaner leaves no streak, I spray one of my many micro fibers clothes and wipe my I’ve filters and lenses to a nice shine and dust them when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Van Hook

customer_reviews.title: Good kit!
customer_reviews.text: Everything in this kit is great— I use the brushes, blower, and cleaning cloths pretty much every day. I prefer other cleaning solutions to the one included, but that’s minor and a personal preference. Regardless, the kit is quality and the customer service at Digital Goja is fantastic. Buy from them.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Good kit for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great, complete kit, enough to do several cameras (I got 4 Nikon D2x). Good case that I will be able to use once I exhaust the supplies. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: andrew wilds

customer_reviews.title: Kit completely delivered on quality
customer_reviews.text: Wow, it's really refreshing to be so completely satisfied with a product. It was exactly what I needed to clean my sensor and the results were great. Quality was super high for the price point. I tried my local camera store, and they wanted either $40 to clean it directly or $70 for a kit.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality case and products. Good assortment of cleaners. Swabs worked great. Well worth the money to have around when you need to clean your gear before, after or during photo jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Decent cleaning kit for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not confident enough in the cleaning fluid to use it on my sensor, but the products seem reasonably well made for the price. It's a good idea to try to get dust out of the brushes prior to using them on your lenses. Seller was very responsive to my complaints.
customer_reviews.author: JackOfAll

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The perfect camera and sensor cleaning kit. Effective and easy to use. And the accompanying YouTube video on the kit is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Yousef Omar

product_meta.title: Altura Photo Professional Cleaning Kit APS-C DSLR Cameras Sensor Cleaning Swabs with Carry Case
product_meta.description:
Note: Please check your camera model and sensor size before purchase. These 16mm sensor cleaning swabs are specifically designed for APS-C sensors measuring 23.6mm x 15.6mm.

The Professional Cleaning Kit by Altura Photo combines all the necessary tools to keep your camera, lens, and sensor free from dust, dirt, and smudges. All neatly packed inside a hard-shell zippered travel case. And by having these tools with you at all times, you will notice a huge improvement in the quality of your photos.

Features:
Altura Photo 16mm Dry Sensor Cleaning Swabs
- 6 Individually wrapped, vacuum-sealed, lint-free sterile fabric sensor cleaning swabs.
- Designed specifically for APS-C sensors.

Altura Photo All Natural 2oz. Cleaning Solution
- Made in the USA!
- 100% safe for all electronics, multi-coated lenses, and digital imaging sensors.
- Does not contain: alcohol, ammonia, solvents, surfactants, detergents, and or VOCs.

Altura Photo Hard-Shell Protective Carrying Case
- Neatly stores and organizes all of your camera and sensor cleaning essentials with top of the line protection.

MagicFiber Microfiber Lens Cleaning Cloth 
- Ultra-gentle! Extremely fine microfiber leaves zero scratches, streaks or marks.
- 1 Extra Large Black 16" X 16"
- 1 Original Grey 6" x 7"

Additional included accessories:
- Altura Photo Air Blower, Lens Cleaning Pen, Lens Cleaning Tissue Paper (50 sheets), and Cleaning Brush

Compatibility
Compatible with, but not limited to the following cameras:
- e.g. Canon: EOS Rebel T3, T3I, T5; EOS 70D, EOS 80D
- e.g. Nikon: D3200, D3300, D5300, D5500, D7200, D500
- e.g. Sony: NEX-5N, A3000, A5000, A6000, A6300
feature_bullets: INCLUDES: 6 Altura Photo 16mm Dry Sensor Cleaning Swabs + Altura Photo All-Natural 2oz. Cleaner + Hard Carrying Case + Lens Cleaning Pen + Lens Brush + Air Blower + 50 Sheet Lens Tissue Paper + 1 Large and Original MagicFiber Microfiber Cleaning Cloth.
SENSOR CLEANING SWABS: Absorbs and sweeps away invisible particles and smudges. Compatible with APS-C sensors.
ALL-NATURAL CLEANING SOLUTION: Uses the power of nature to clean without leaving streaks or blemishes. Safe for all electronics, coated lenses and sensors.
TRAVEL CASE: Stores and protects all of the essential tools.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Backed with Digital Goja 90-Day 100% Satisfaction Guarantee.
